description.value:
Sulis raised by widely traveled jann parents or similar plane-hopping ancestors learn to traverse myriad societies with ease. A suli with this trait gains a +2 racial bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.LeZmnFwnlB89ovBB]{Culture} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C]{Diplomacy} checks. They also gain an additional starting language from Aquan, Auran, Ignan, and Terran.

This replaces elemental assault.

modifiers.name: Skilled Mediator
modifiers.notes: Sulis raised by widely traveled jann parents or similar plane-hopping ancestors learn to traverse myriad societies with ease. A suli with this trait gains a +2 racial bonus to  Culture and  Diplomacy checks. They also gain an additional starting language from Aquan, Auran, Ignan, and Terran.
